about_the_game:
Eater Bundle : - unlocks 7 new in-game cosmetics 4 hats 2 visors & 1 nameplate

- (Hat) Horror (color adaptative)
- (Hat) Brain
- (Hat) Reaper
- (Hat) Hollow (Dual skin)
- (Visor) Blood
- (Visor) Scythe
- (Nameplate) The Eater !

"This mod is not affiliated with Among Us or Innersloth LLC, and the content contained therein is not endorsed or otherwise sponsored by Innersloth LLC. Portions of the materials contained herein are property of Innersloth LLC. © Innersloth LLC."

name: AmongUS Challenger - Eater Bundle (2022)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel core i3 / Ryzen 3 / or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 / Ryzen 3 / or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
